department: Royal Canadian Government Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Procurement of Rotary Chairs and Rotary Stools
description: Seeking the purchase, delivery and installation of office seating to Shediac, NB. Estimated completion date for the project is on or before February 16, 2024. Suppliers must be pre-qualified and have been issued a supply arrangement.
full_summary:
===============================================================================

### **Rotary Chairs Request for Proposal (RFP)**

#### Government Tender Announcement

* **Reference Number:** WS4215492310- Doc4256051307
* **Amendment Number:** 3
* **Publication Date:** 2023-10-12
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-31T14:00:00

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating for the Department of Public Works and Government Services in Shediac, New Brunswick.

#### Description of Requirement

The RFP is issued pursuant to the Public Services and Procurement (PSPC) Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/H and covers a requirement from the following Product Category:

* Product Sub-category 1 - Rotary Chairs and Rotary Stools

The requirement is for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating to Shediac, New Brunswick by February 16, 2024. The RFP is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Columbia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Chili Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement.

#### Tender Procedure

Only suppliers who are pre-qualified and have been issued a supply arrangement are eligible to bid. Non-Supply Arrangement (Non-SA) holders may submit a bid to the Identified User (IU) but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA) for evaluation.

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Bronwen Grieve, Supply Manager, PSPC, at [bronwen.grieve@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:bronwen.grieve@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

#### Notice URL

The RFP can be accessed at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17706069?extsite=MTc3MDYwNjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Regards to the Corporation.
